name: Helvetica Twitter
description: Hey, if you have Helvetica Neue fonts intalled in your PC but Twitter.com render them up so horrible... this code can fix the CSS for that case.
css:
* { font-family: "HelveticaNeueLT Std", "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", "HelveticaNeue", Arial, sans-serif; !important;
text-shadow: none !important; }
